Located in well established community, this 2 bedroom apartment plus maids room apartment comes with 3 bathrooms , 1 parking space and an area of 2799 sq. ft This 2 bedroom apartment plus maids room apartment has Sea and Community View. Mamsha Al Saadiyat in Saadiyat Cultural District promises to be a first-of-its-kind beachfront residential and retail destination. Offering a range of lofts and spacious apartments and townhouses within walking distance of Louvre Abu Dhabi, Zayed National Museum, and Guggenheim Abu Dhabi, as well as The District retail complex, where world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment venues await.
